ctx: Na Škotskem se nasmiha zmaga nacionalistom
content:
Zadnja sprememba: anon-26398 04.05.2007 13:33
Once upon the time...

William Wallace - Aye, fight and you may die, run, and you'll
live... at least for a while. And dying in your beds, many years
from now, would you be willin' to trade ALL the days, from this day
to that, for one chance, just one chance, to come back here and
tell our enemies that they may take our lives, but they'll never
take... OUR FREEDOM!

And now: Sctoland will be free once again!
author: anon-26398
